body_html:
@praveeny1986 you might be running into some scoping issues when you build your model.

This is a working example for TF 1.6.0.
https://gist.github.com/protoget/9b45881f23c96e201a90581c8f4b692d

It's no different than your example above, only slightly modified to make it a self-contained runnable script.

body:
@praveeny1986 you might be running into some scoping issues when you build your model.

This is a working example for TF 1.6.0.
